name: places/ChIJMUUWj1FYwokRr4JJOO8uY3s
adrFormatAddress: 666 10th Ave, New York, NY 10036-2932, USA

originalText.text: Got my 6months old kitten neutered few days ago and I was very satisfied! The assistant at the front desk was very helpful, nice and patient. She answered all of my questions and even called the day after his surgery to check up on him. Dr.Perez was a calm and knowledgeable vet he made me feel at ease. I used a friends of animal certificate here and the additional fees was affordable compared to other places. I would definitely recommend here. Not sure why there is so many negative reviews.

originalText.text:
I found WSAH through the FRIENDS OF ANIMALS service program.

Dr. Perez bedside manner with the animals is incredible!

He‚Äôs not much of a talker and has a quiet demeanor - but as a millennial, and first- generation American I get it, and I‚Äôm really just coming in for him to care and service my pup & he exceeded my expectations!

Once he planted a kiss on my puppy, after the initial consult before the neutering, I knew my Simba was in good hands!

Yes, I agree with the other reviews that it was a little pricier than other places, who partner with programs, such as Friends of Animals. I get that we are all ‚Äòballin on a budget‚Äô - but $$ comes and goes? My dog‚Äôs health does not. So to me? It was worth it and this is Simba‚Äôs new and only vet (side note, he is my 3rd dog in life - I‚Äôve had my fair share of vet experiences).

I‚Äôd also like to add that, yes, corporations that offer veterinary services, are likely more affordable than what I paid. Nevertheless, we NEED to as a community to support our local businesses.

*Leasing nor paying employees is cheap in this city, Dr. Perez is more than generous with his pricing, it‚Äôs literally the standard industry rate.*

Lastly, I don‚Äôt know what those other reviewers were insinuating with him trying to ‚Äúsuggest‚Äù and ‚Äúupsell‚Äù but he did not do that to me.

I was straightforward and clear about what I needed and my budget, I also vetted myself on the standard industry rate of these procedures (the vaccines my dog was missing) to speak to the Dr and see if he could work with me. Literally all we need to do as a community is talk to and work with one another.

Due to him doing this for the love of animals and not money, is clearly why he agreed and quickly got me scheduled.

Oh, and the front desk personnel? AMAZING!!!

Thanks for reading! I would 10/10 recommend this place to family and friends! ‚ù§Ô∏èüê∂ü¶¥

originalText.text: Got my kitten neutered here as the local Humane Society was booked and hadn‚Äôt responded to my text for an appointment. The receptionist on the phone and in person was nice and didn‚Äôt mind answering any questions I had (regarding prices too). The pricing was affordable, but definitely a bit more than some low cost vet clinics. There is a pre-op required involving an exam and blood work which was around $222. With the certificate, the neuter and other things like anesthesia costs around $160 (including microchip if you want it). Dropping off my kitten and picking him back up took under 6 hours and everything was smooth. The clinic itself is a bit small, but I never dealt with crowding as it seems to only be 1 or 2 people inside at a time usually. Dr. Perez did a good job performing the surgery and was a very chill guy. Although this isn‚Äôt my first choice, it‚Äôs easy to book an appointment, but if you‚Äôre looking for cheaper than look elsewhere.

originalText.text: Got my cat neutered here with Friends of Animals certificate. Also got him vaccinated. The staff here was so friendly and very kind to my cat. They were transparent with all the pricing over the phone, and the prices were very reasonable compared to other vets. The man at desk was very cool. It was quick and easy. I recommend going here. The vet was so smart and gave me a bunch of helpful information.

The vet was so smart and gave me a bunch of helpful information.

originalText.text: Friendly staff, great doctor. Had my dog spayed, they took Friends of animals certificate (Call first) The Dr was amazing. Full speedy recovery and I have an awkward dog. She‚Äôs a French and bulldog mix. Would recommend great prices as well. Best vet in the city. Novie says thank you !!!
